Package algorithms.imageProcessing.transform

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ITransformationFit  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractTransformationFit  
    Alignment
    various 3D alignment methods
    BundleAdjustment
    given intrinsic and extrinsic camera parameters, coordinates for points in a world reference frame, and observations of those points in one or more camera, return data structures needed by Levenberg-Marquardt algorithm in refinement of the intrinsic and extrinsic camera parameters.
    BundleAdjustment.AuxiliaryArrays  
    Camera
    utility methods for camera intrinsic and extrinsic matrices.
    Camera.CameraExtrinsicParameters  
    Camera.CameraIntrinsicParameters  
    Camera.CameraMatrices  
    Camera.CameraParameters  
    Camera.CameraProjection  
    CameraCalibration
    estimate the camera intrinsic and extrinsic parameters using 3 images or more of the same objects with different camera poses.
    CameraPose
    given a set of features in image coordinates and world coordinate space with known camera intrinsic parameters, estimate the camera pose, that is extract the camera extrinsic parameters.
    Distances  
    EpipolarFeatureTransformationFit  
    EpipolarTransformationFit  
    EpipolarTransformer
    class to solve for the epipoles for two images with stereo projection and apply the solution.
    EpipolarTransformer.NormalizationTransformations  
    EpipolarTransformer.NormalizedXY  
    EuclideanEvaluator  
    EuclideanTransformationFit  
    MatchedPointsTransformationCalculator  
    MatlabFunctions  
    PNP
    iterative non-linear optimization using Levenberg-Marquardt algorithm to minimize the re-projection error of perspective projection in "perspective-n-point".
    Reconstruction
    given correspondence between two images calculate the camera parameters as intrinsic and extrinsic parameters, and the real world position.
    Reconstruction.OrthographicProjectionResults  
    Reconstruction.ParaperspectiveProjectionResults  
    Reconstruction.ProjectionResults  
    Reconstruction.ReconstructionResults  
    Rectification  
    Rectification.RectifiedImage  
    Rectification.RectifiedPoints  
    Rotation
    a utility class holding rotations associated with euler angles, quaternions, and angle-axis representations (using rodrigues formula for the later).
    Rotation.AuxiliaryArrays  
    TransformationParameters  
    Transformer  
    Triangulation
    given correspondence between two images and intrinsic and extrinsic camera parameters, determine the real world position.
    Triangulation.WCSResults  
    Util
